STATIC_heading.text: Â PRONUNCIATION OF TERMS

STATIC_text.text:
The terms you have learned in this chapter are presented here with their pronunciations. The CAPITAL letters indicate the accented syllable.

The meanings for all the terms are in the Mini-Dictionary. You can also hear each term pronounced on the Evolve website (http://evolve.elsevier.com/Chabner/language/).
Note : A combination Review Sheet for this chapter and the next one is provided in Chapter 6. Please visit the Evolve site for additional exercises, games, and images related to this chapter.
